scenes.text: The African Caribbean Society (ACS) is a society focused on educating and bringing together the peopelr of Cardiff and to provide a deeper understanding of African Caribbean Heritage, and we welcome anyone who wishes to get involved.
We are committed to meeting on a regular basis, and share the events coming up on our SU page and our social medias.
Our membership is Â£6.00, but most events will still require tickets, even for free events due to limited capacity, although paid events are often discounted for members.
Our socials consist of nights out clubbing, sports events for our teams, simple hang outs, dinners, parties, Afrogene our annual talent showcase and more!
